TopicTitle: Jet flameout bar in staging icons

Articles.Content:
We need a jet flameout indicator in the staging icons. It could work just like the overheat indicators.

My understanding of the flameout mechanics leads me to believe that this would be fairly simple, reliable, easy to implement, and much better than keeping track of intake air.

Looking forward to hearing criticism. Flame away.

Flame out!!! Why is nobody responding. This would be very useful for a lot of reasons. And sounds pretty simple potentially. Must be too high in the atmosphere for most peoples air intake capacity.... 8\

I like it, only thing is it would detract from some of the difficulty it creates for space planes. (the better you are, the later you manage to leave it before you switch to rockets whereas a beginner might go a either a bit late and get a flame out or early and be less efficient.) Not well explained I know, but what im trying to say is that it would make it less of a challenge. Although you could add a toggle in the alt f12 menu?
